sentences.english: Suddenly a great cockchafer buzzed along. Alas!

sentences.english: The bees go buzzing by, and there's a lovely kite just ready to fly.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂嗡嗡嗡地飞过，有一只可爱的风筝正准备起飞了。

sentences.english: Suddenly a great cockchafer buzzed along. Alas!
sentences.chinese: 突然一只很大的金龟子嗡嗡嗡飞过。

sentences.english: They buzzed around the prince and stung his face and hands.
sentences.chinese: 它们嗡嗡嗡地围在王子四周，蜇他的脸和手。

sentences.english: Traffic cars, cell phone calls, top video screams at me.
sentences.chinese: 车水马龙，电话嘤嗡，高端影视等伴我周围。

sentences.english: Other company little troops crying out the spirit answer with o o o.
sentences.chinese: 别连的小部队嗡嗡嗡地喊著精神答数。

sentences.english: Chanting Om has been the most effective method for me.
sentences.chinese: 吟唱“嗡”，对我曾是最有效的办法。

sentences.english: The busy bees buzz at the big bear.
sentences.chinese: 忙碌的蜜蜂对着大熊嗡嗡嗡。

sentences.chinese: 突然一只很大的金龟子嗡嗡嗡飞过。
